title: Andrew Mitchell – 2006 Speech at the Conservative Party Conference
author: admin
summary: The speech made by Andrew Mitchell, the then Shadow Secretary of State for International Development, on 4 October 2006.
content:
I think David Cameron has given me the most exciting job in the Shadow Cabinet and one of the most worthwhile.
